title: robertcarlyle
author: robertcarlyle
content: What if 1000 usd worth of bitcoin were bought on may 16, 2011, how much would it be worth today?

comments.author: freedomgo
comments.body: You can check the price history here. https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/bitcoin/But let's say the price that time was $3.50, so you'll be able to buy BTC285.71 (1000/3/5)BTC285.71 x 60480 (current price) = $17,280,000answer =Â  $17,280,000

comments.author: Ambatman
comments.body: I guess you might not be aware No you should because this has been brought to your notice before What you doing is spamming Made a thread and asked of the price in 2009 and now in 2011.This could have been asked in the same thread and if you had read it Then it would have been possible for you to get answers to your question with some help that was shared in the thread. If you continue in this direction there's a likelihood you would get tagged for spamming if you lucky. Two word should atleast be enough for the wise.

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: Quote from: robertcarlyle on October 09, 2024, 11:49:54 PMWhat if 1000 usd worth of bitcoin were bought on may 16, 2011, how much would it be worth today?Quote from: robertcarlyle on October 09, 2024, 06:48:12 PMIf someone in the u.s. bought 1000 usd worth of bitcoin on february 19, 2009, how much would that be worth today??Quote from: robertcarlyle on October 07, 2024, 02:49:36 AMWhat would 15 million usd at 3% dividends return be if not 600k usd annually? OP, have you confused the forum with the school?Why do you ask math problems from topic to topic?

comments.author: FortuneFollower
comments.body: Quote from: Ambatman on October 10, 2024, 04:55:02 AMI guess you might not be aware No you should because this has been brought to your notice before What you doing is spamming Made a thread and asked of the price in 2009 and now in 2011.This could have been asked in the same thread and if you had read it Then it would have been possible for you to get answers to your question with some help that was shared in the thread. If you continue in this direction there's a likelihood you would get tagged for spamming if you lucky. Two word should atleast be enough for the wise. This is only the second thread in this theme, though, I agree that that same question could be asked on the previous one, or just to recreate into the "Calculations" thread or something, if OP is eager to ask math, though it can be done by himself, so the topic is there just to be answered in 5-10 minutes If there would be more of such, then, yeah, it's obvious that it's done for things you described.
